\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em \-Decoded frames iterator. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\subsubsection{\-Detailed \-Description}
\-This abstraction allows applications using this decoder to easily support multiple video formats with minimal code duplication. \-This section describes the interface common to all decoders. 

\subsubsection{\-Define \-Documentation}
\hypertarget{group__decoder_ga9e33b8ee81025d5fc3d01b0975ad5f96}{
\index{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}!\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-S\-L\-I\-C\-E@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-S\-L\-I\-C\-E}}
\index{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-S\-L\-I\-C\-E@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-S\-L\-I\-C\-E}!Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}}
\paragraph[{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-S\-L\-I\-C\-E}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-S\-L\-I\-C\-E~0x10000}}
\label{group__decoder_ga9e33b8ee81025d5fc3d01b0975ad5f96}


\-Decoder capabilities bitfield. 

\-Each decoder advertises the capabilities it supports as part of its \hyperlink{group__codec_gad654f3da60151f5dfef70aca00ef1e9e}{vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-iface\-\_\-t} interface structure. \-Capabilities are extra interfaces or functionality, and are not required to be supported by a decoder.

\-The available flags are specified by \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-$\ast$ defines. \-Will issue put\-\_\-slice callbacks \hypertarget{group__decoder_ga0ef59ca8067ac1dc8c8378042277ccc8}{
\index{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}!\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-M\-E@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-M\-E}}
\index{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-M\-E@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-M\-E}!Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}}
\paragraph[{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-M\-E}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-M\-E~0x20000}}
\label{group__decoder_ga0ef59ca8067ac1dc8c8378042277ccc8}
\-Will issue put\-\_\-frame callbacks \hypertarget{group__decoder_ga7825ade982ab85a5583d3d8a669baa3b}{
\index{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}!\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-O\-S\-T\-P\-R\-O\-C@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-P\-O\-S\-T\-P\-R\-O\-C}}

\label{group__decoder_ga7825ade982ab85a5583d3d8a669baa3b}
\-Can postprocess decoded frame \hypertarget{group__decoder_gac44cd9e4722e1eb32a37c3eaec8d97b9}{

\paragraph[{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-E\-R\-R\-O\-R\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-C\-E\-A\-L\-M\-E\-N\-T}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-A\-P\-\_\-\-E\-R\-R\-O\-R\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-C\-E\-A\-L\-M\-E\-N\-T~0x80000}}

\-Can receive encoded frames one fragment at a time \hypertarget{group__decoder_ga6fe14f30254aff769412b128b29664cc}{

\index{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-P\-O\-S\-T\-P\-R\-O\-C@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-P\-O\-S\-T\-P\-R\-O\-C}!Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}}
\paragraph[{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-P\-O\-S\-T\-P\-R\-O\-C}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-P\-O\-S\-T\-P\-R\-O\-C~0x10000}}
\label{group__decoder_ga6fe14f30254aff769412b128b29664cc}


\-Initialization-\/time \-Feature \-Enabling. 

\-Certain codec features must be known at initialization time, to allow for proper memory allocation.

\-The available flags are specified by \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-$\ast$ defines. \-Postprocess decoded frame \hypertarget{group__decoder_ga520d7005e360202f5844982fa2392581}{
\index{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}!\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-E\-R\-R\-O\-R\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-C\-E\-A\-L\-M\-E\-N\-T@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-E\-R\-R\-O\-R\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-C\-E\-A\-L\-M\-E\-N\-T}}
\index{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-E\-R\-R\-O\-R\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-C\-E\-A\-L\-M\-E\-N\-T@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-E\-R\-R\-O\-R\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-C\-E\-A\-L\-M\-E\-N\-T}!Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}}
\paragraph[{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-E\-R\-R\-O\-R\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-C\-E\-A\-L\-M\-E\-N\-T}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-E\-R\-R\-O\-R\-\_\-\-C\-O\-N\-C\-E\-A\-L\-M\-E\-N\-T~0x20000}}
\label{group__decoder_ga520d7005e360202f5844982fa2392581}
\-Conceal errors in decoded frames \hypertarget{group__decoder_ga378855a0318396d6e4e585bd3bacbf3f}{
\index{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}!\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-I\-N\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-G\-M\-E\-N\-T\-S@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-I\-N\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-G\-M\-E\-N\-T\-S}}
\index{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-I\-N\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-G\-M\-E\-N\-T\-S@{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-I\-N\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-G\-M\-E\-N\-T\-S}!Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}}
\paragraph[{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-I\-N\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-G\-M\-E\-N\-T\-S}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-I\-N\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-G\-M\-E\-N\-T\-S~0x40000}}
\label{group__decoder_ga378855a0318396d6e4e585bd3bacbf3f}
\-The input frame should be passed to the decoder one fragment at a time \hypertarget{group__decoder_ga8c2f0b12f1bd4927eb3c68b01eab19d3}{

\begin{DoxyParamCaption}

)~vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-dec\-\_\-init\-\_\-ver(ctx, iface, cfg, flags, \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-D\-E\-C\-O\-D\-E\-R\-\_\-\-A\-B\-I\-\_\-\-V\-E\-R\-S\-I\-O\-N)}}
\label{group__decoder_ga8c2f0b12f1bd4927eb3c68b01eab19d3}


\-Convenience macro for \hyperlink{group__decoder_ga26fe82cf8fd697f885935cea53be964f}{vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-dec\-\_\-init\-\_\-ver()} 

\-Ensures the \-A\-B\-I version parameter is properly set. 

\subsubsection{\-Typedef \-Documentation}

\-Stream properties. 

\-This structure is used to query or set properties of the decoded stream. \-Algorithms may extend this structure with data specific to their bitstream by setting the sz member appropriately. \hypertarget{group__decoder_ga4a2e808eb43f1e798024b5a409c484f9}{

\-This structure is used to pass init time configuration options to the decoder. alias for struct \hyperlink{structvpx__codec__dec__cfg}{vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-dec\-\_\-cfg}

\label{group__decoder_ga26fe82cf8fd697f885935cea53be964f}


\-Initialize a decoder instance. 

\-Initializes a decoder context using the given interface. \-Applications should call the vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-dec\-\_\-init convenience macro instead of this function directly, to ensure that the \-A\-B\-I version number parameter is properly initialized.

\-In \-X\-M\-A mode (activated by setting \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-X\-M\-A in the flags parameter), the storage pointed to by the cfg parameter must be kept readable and stable until all memory maps have been set.


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{\-Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em ctx} & \-Pointer to this instance's context. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em iface} & \-Pointer to the algorithm interface to use. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em cfg} & \-Configuration to use, if known. \-May be \-N\-U\-L\-L. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em flags} & \-Bitfield of \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-$\ast$ flags \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em ver} & \-A\-B\-I version number. \-Must be set to \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-D\-E\-C\-O\-D\-E\-R\-\_\-\-A\-B\-I\-\_\-\-V\-E\-R\-S\-I\-O\-N \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

\begin{DoxyRetVals}{\-Return values}
{\em \hyperlink{group__codec_ggada1084710837ad363b92f2379dd2b8d2af1dcde74b1c5ff7b29f31246dfd90986}{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-O\-K}} & \-The decoder algorithm initialized. \\
\hline
{\em \hyperlink{group__codec_ggada1084710837ad363b92f2379dd2b8d2a96c6d2600dc0ec25c2cb798e8d2f4760}{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-M\-E\-M\-\_\-\-E\-R\-R\-O\-R}} & \-Memory allocation failed. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyRetVals}

\label{group__decoder_gadfee4664d644175d5aac1465ef11c4b0}


\-Parse stream info from a buffer. 

\-Performs high level parsing of the bitstream. \-Construction of a decoder context is not necessary. \-Can be used to determine if the bitstream is of the proper format, and to extract information from the stream.


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{\-Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em iface} & \-Pointer to the algorithm interface \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em data} & \-Pointer to a block of data to parse \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em data\-\_\-sz} & \-Size of the data buffer \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in,out}  & {\em si} & \-Pointer to stream info to update. \-The size member \hyperlink{rfc2119_MUST}{\-M\-U\-S\-T} be properly initialized, but \hyperlink{rfc2119_MAY}{\-M\-A\-Y} be clobbered by the algorithm. \-This parameter \hyperlink{rfc2119_MAY}{\-M\-A\-Y} be \-N\-U\-L\-L.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

\begin{DoxyRetVals}{\-Return values}
{\em \hyperlink{group__codec_ggada1084710837ad363b92f2379dd2b8d2af1dcde74b1c5ff7b29f31246dfd90986}{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-O\-K}} & \-Bitstream is parsable and stream information updated \\
\hline
\end{DoxyRetVals}

\paragraph[{vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-decode}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-err\-\_\-t} vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-decode (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-ctx\-\_\-t} $\ast$}]{ctx, }
\item[{const uint8\-\_\-t $\ast$}]{data, }
\item[{unsigned int}]{data\-\_\-sz, }
\item[{void $\ast$}]{user\-\_\-priv, }
\item[{long}]{deadline}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}
\label{group__decoder_ga3441e157a7a69108bca9a069f2ee8e0d}


\-Decode data. 

\-Processes a buffer of coded data. \-If the processing results in a new decoded frame becoming available, \-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-S\-L\-I\-C\-E and \-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-M\-E events may be generated, as appropriate. \-Encoded data \hyperlink{rfc2119_MUST}{\-M\-U\-S\-T} be passed in \-D\-T\-S (decode time stamp) order. \-Frames produced will always be in \-P\-T\-S (presentation time stamp) order. \-If the decoder is configured with \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-U\-S\-E\-\_\-\-I\-N\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-G\-M\-E\-N\-T\-S enabled, data and data\-\_\-sz can contain a fragment of the encoded frame. \-Fragment \#n must contain at least partition \#n, but can also contain subsequent partitions (\#n+1 -\/ \#n+i), and if so, fragments \#n+1, .., \#n+i must be empty. \-When no more data is available, this function should be called with \-N\-U\-L\-L as data and 0 as data\-\_\-sz. \-The memory passed to this function must be available until the frame has been decoded.


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{\-Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em ctx} & \-Pointer to this instance's context \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em data} & \-Pointer to this block of new coded data. \-If \-N\-U\-L\-L, a \-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-C\-B\-\_\-\-P\-U\-T\-\_\-\-F\-R\-A\-M\-E event is posted for the previously decoded frame. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em data\-\_\-sz} & \-Size of the coded data, in bytes. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em user\-\_\-priv} & \-Application specific data to associate with this frame. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em deadline} & \-Soft deadline the decoder should attempt to meet, in us. \-Set to zero for unlimited.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{\-Returns}
\-Returns \hyperlink{group__codec_ggada1084710837ad363b92f2379dd2b8d2af1dcde74b1c5ff7b29f31246dfd90986}{\-V\-P\-X\-\_\-\-C\-O\-D\-E\-C\-\_\-\-O\-K} if the coded data was processed completely and future pictures can be decoded without error. \-Otherwise, see the descriptions of the other error codes in \hyperlink{group__codec_gada1084710837ad363b92f2379dd2b8d2}{vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-err\-\_\-t} for recoverability capabilities. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\hypertarget{group__decoder_ga0e231c3a5ce445fdb2268d741da97500}{
\index{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface@{\-Decoder Algorithm Interface}!vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-get\-\_\-frame@{vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-get\-\_\-frame}}

\begin{DoxyParamCaption}

\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}
\label{group__decoder_ga0e231c3a5ce445fdb2268d741da97500}


\-Decoded frames iterator. 

\-Iterates over a list of the frames available for display. \-The iterator storage should be initialized to \-N\-U\-L\-L to start the iteration. \-Iteration is complete when this function returns \-N\-U\-L\-L.

\-The list of available frames becomes valid upon completion of the vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-decode call, and remains valid until the next call to vpx\-\_\-codec\-\_\-decode.


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{\-Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em ctx} & \-Pointer to this instance's context \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in,out}  & {\em iter} & \-Iterator storage, initialized to \-N\-U\-L\-L\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{\-Returns}
\-Returns a pointer to an image, if one is ready for display. \-Frames produced will always be in \-P\-T\-S (presentation time stamp) order. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
